comments:
Running Eclipse 3.1M4.  We launch a headless Eclipse application with the 
following command (all on one line, of course):

java.exe -Djava.library.path=D:\Temp4
\eclipse\plugins\com.ibm.tivoli.rmb.model_2.0.0\os\win32\x86 -
Dwrmbcli.climode=true -cp D:\Temp4
\eclipse\plugins\com.ibm.tivoli.rmb.model_2.0.0\..\
..\startup.jar org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main -application com.ibm.tivoli.rmb.mo
del.wrmbcli -noSplash -noRegistryCache -data D:\Temp\wrmbcli.workspace

The following trace entry is seen in the metadata.log file:

is using caching since this went unnoticed since M4.
